title: Responsive E-commerce Admin Portal
description: A modern E-commerce Admin Portal built with React.js, and CSS. It allows administrators to manage a coffee shop catalog through a clean UI and intuitive navigation.

title: Math Learning System
description: Built a Python-based solution generator and Markdown template system to deliver detailed explanations of math questions.

title: Heart Failure Readmission Prediction
description: A predictive deep learning project using NLP and CNN to analyze clinical notes from Kaggle datasets. Achieved 8.2% better accuracy than traditional models. Included hyperparameter tuning and chi-square feature analysis for medical insight.

title: Where to Go Application
description: A travel companion app built with Java and Kotlin in Android Studio. It merges functionalities from multiple travel apps to compare weather conditions between cities. Features include user signup/login, favorite cities, customizable comparisons, and real-time weather with Google Maps SDK integration.
